item.title: Imperial College takes over LSE
item.author: Alessandro Bullitta,
item.description: A delegation of the ICMUN society took part in the LSEMUN, held on the main campus at LSE in early February. This is different than most of the MUN conferences as it’s completely focused on Crisis committees, an unusual and slightly underrated ‘mode’ in MUNs. In Crisis, delegates don’t represent …
